channel.title: Swift on 3am engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on 3am engineering

item.title: Metalens for Hacker News
item.description: 2022 Update The app is no longer available, planning to release an updated open source version, soon… Download it on the app store TL;DR: If you downloaded the app don’t forget to toggle the Safari switch in Settings The “Do something with Hacker News” idea Searching for HN clients on the app store results in many reasonable looking apps. Some of them abandoned a few years back, others look like a developer needed at least one random published app to apply for the job.
